me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.protocol

Class PacketAPIUtilityImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.protocol.PacketAPIUtilityImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    me.bigteddy98.packetapi.api.PacketListener, ProtocolUtilities

    public class PacketAPIUtilityImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProtocolUtilities, me.bigteddy98.packetapi.api.PacketListener
    A wrapper for some protocol abilities in PacketAPI. Little wrapper classes exist in the library in question, so reflection is still required.
    Author:
    Glen Husman
